phrases: Find a partner and hold hands!
Find a partner and hold hands!
Find a partner and hold hands!
Who wants to be Miyamura-kun's partner?
We will be doing an experiment today,
so get into groups of five.
He is totally impossible to read.
Honestly, it is kind of impressive how gloomy he is all the time.
we have to group up with the person next to us on the roster.
Apparently we are going to be grouped up on the next report.
You should at least know the names of the people in your class.
Did not she just say she did not know who I was, though?
Everyone says you are all dark and gloomy.
That is why I talked to you.
That is Why It is Okay
That is Why It is Okay
That is Why It is Okay
I am in Class 1 with you, Yuki!
I am in Class 1 with you, Yuki!
Miyamura, I am in your class!
It is the power of love!
Because they are in the same class?
We will be together till graduation!
What class are you in, Miyamura?
Whoa, why are you tearing up?!
You are going to break his spine.
Hey, Ishikawa, you know how you gave me that song I wanted?
I totally deleted it by accident yesterday.
-Yeah, my storage was full, so I went to delete stuff and poof.
-Yeah, my storage was full, so I went to delete stuff and poof.
-I thought you bought the one with the most space.
That is why I thought I would be safe!
That is why I thought I would be safe!
-Man, their new album is so good.
-but am I really a part of it?
-Man, their new album is so good.
-but am I really a part of it?
-I have to wait till my older sister finishes with the CD first though.
Now I want the new album, too.
Go ahead and split up into groups of four to work on your reports.
Go ahead and split up into groups of four to work on your reports.
Miyamura, are you all by yourself?
You have got a million, right?
I do not have a million!
Pen bullies like you do not get a pen!
Mmkay, Hori'll turn our outline into a draft.
Kyoko Hori Yuki Yoshikawa Izumi Miyamura Toru Ishikawa
Toru will not give me my pen back!
Because I am still using it!
Are they cool with me being their friend?
I heard our next class got switched from Math to Econ.
Shoot, did I bring that textbook today?
Really wish they would not switch things up on a dime.
I thought you were listening to me!
Ishikawa-kun, what... do you think of me?
You cannot ask people that with a straight face.
You cannot ask people that with a straight face.
And I am super annoyed about you getting along so well with Hori.
And I am super annoyed about you getting along so well with Hori.
And you never say what you mean.
And you never say what you mean.
You are way too nice to people.
I always have to keep an eye on you.
And when you take off your glasses and put your hair up, you are prettier than most girls.
How you get me to say the dumbest shit!
You are also the only person who calls me by my last name,
so I kind of wonder what you think of me, too.
Do not say it if you are just going to get all embarrassed, you idiot!
I-I just said it out loud, jeez!
Come to think of it, that is the first time ever in high school
that I have called a classmate by their first name.
You are just kind of awkward.
I wish I could go back ten years and tell myself that.
Hori, listen, you got to avoid flicking the bone!
I told you we were going to finish our report over lunch!
Where the heck did you wander off to?!
The roof, to affirm our friendship.
You are creeping me out, you two idiots.
Hey, Yoshikawa's here, so there are three idiots!
What did you just call me?!
So I watched that show you said you liked, Ishikawa-kun.
Hey, Izu- Miyamura, what part did you like the most?
Here I thought we were on a first-name basis now...
You are heading to school already?
Sota's been getting up way earlier now that he is in grade school...
I totally thought we had a morning assembly today.
I mean, you are not dating, right?
So you would not care if him and I got close, yeah?
I am not giving him to you.
But you said you are just friends, right?
I am not giving you Miyamura.
He does not belong to you!
I will never let you have him!
Wonder if the cafeteria's open yet.
Miyamura does not belong to anyone.
I know I should not be surprised, but seriously...
Sota needs to stop changing in here before he goes out to play!
He is not here again today?
He probably came home, then went right out to play soccer.
You cannot do blueberries, right, Hori-san?
Ever since Sota started grade school,
we have been spending a lot more time alone together.
That fruit tart you brought over the other day was really good.
You are just saying that because you are scared, right?
No, that is just the only way it could pop out at them like that.
Oh, my mom's going to be late again.
It will be back in a second.
What are you looking so scared for?
Okay, let us move on to disc two!
There are more in this horror collection?!
IT COULD HAPPEN TO YOU: Real Horror Stories 49
There are more in this horror collection?!
IT COULD HAPPEN TO YOU: Real Horror Stories 49
IT COULD HAPPEN TO YOU: Real Horror Stories 49
We are going to watch the first three,
IT COULD HAPPEN TO YOU: Real Horror Stories 49
then the last two after Sota gets home.
then the last two after Sota gets home.
Dang, Yuki, your hands are tiny!
Does not it make your heart skip a beat when someone grabs your hand?
Sure, but your hands are small compared to us guys, Hori.
I am not comparing them to guys' hands right now.
Grab my hand and you are a dead man.
I could die if I touch Hori!
Is it just your index finger?
Yeah, it is always been like this.
Did you break it or something?
I wonder how the joint works.
I would have to get an x-ray.
Your hands are so pale, Miyamura.
Is that a writer's callus, Hori-san?
It is so weird how your hands are bigger than mine, Miyamura!
I totally thought they were smaller.
I love your hands, they are-they are nice!
I was just thinking, Man, I love'them!
And I hold my pencil right, so I do not have a callus like you.
Hori-san put the DVDs back in the wrong cases, so I am fixing it.
You are eating with us, right, Miyamura?
Oh, yeah, if that is okay.
Okay, then you and Sota need to go wash your hands!
So I was just talking to her,
and she said she is never letting me have Miyamura-kun!
I mean, I was just joking, but she got like, actually mad!
That is'because you take your jokes way too far, Remi.
I got into a fight and got hit in the face.
I mean, sure, he is a big dummy dum-dum,
but I never thought he would get violent with a friend.
Nope, I do not want to hear it.
I know just the kind of guy he is now, thank you!
So you beat the crap out of each other?
I dodged everything'cept that first punch.
Then I beat Ishikawa-kun to a pulp...
Then I beat Ishikawa-kun to a pulp...
You are kind of scary, Miyamura.
It is none of your business, Hori.
I still cannot believe you two got into an actual fight.
Look, I know it is not happening, okay?
Hori's in love with you, Miyamura.
You mentioned that before, but I still think you are wrong.
How would you react if I said I was not?
Are you trying to psych me out?
If Hori said, to your face, that she loves you, what would you say?
Would you just brush it off like that?
Hori-san just sees me as a friend.
Why do you keep going back to that?
Because if I do not, you will keep asking me the same question.
Besides, it is obvious she does not like me like that.
I would like to know why you think you are right.
I know your own feelings probably influence your perception,
but you cannot assume how Hori-san feels without asking her.
You are not going to listen otherwise!
You beat the shit out of me!
That was uncalled for and has nothing to do with Hori!
It was just'because I startled you, then?
No, I was also kind of pissed at you.
You are not supposed to admit that!
You are freakin' me out, man!
C'mon, go apologize to him and make up.
Wow, Miyamura said it was all his fault.
That is not what Toru said.
First they beat each other up, now they both take the blame?
Man, what were they even fighting about?
It is so cool that guys can just duke it out with each other.
